verses.verse: "Hear, <S%H8085><s%> O Israel! <S%H3478><s%> You are crossing <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> today <S%H3117><s%> to go <S%H935><s%> in to dispossess <S%H3423><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> greater <S%H1419><s%> and mightier <S%H6099><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> you, great <S%H1419><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> fortified <S%H1219><s%> to heaven, <S%H8064><s%>

a people <S%H5971><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> and tall, <S%H7311><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of the Anakim, <S%H6062><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> you know <S%H3045><s%> and of whom <S%H834><s%> you have heard <S%H8085><s%> [it said], 'Who <S%H4310><s%> can stand <S%H3320><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Anak <S%H6061><s%>?'

"Know <S%H3045><s%> therefore today <S%H3117><s%> that it is the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> who is crossing <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you as a consuming <S%H398><s%> fire. <S%H784><s%> He will destroy <S%H8045><s%> them and He will subdue <S%H3665><s%> them before <S%H6440><s%> you, so that you may drive <S%H3423><s%> them out and destroy them quickly, <S%H6><s%> just <S%H4118><s%> as the Lord <S%H9201><s%> has spoken <S%H3068><s%> to you.

"Do not say <S%H559><s%> in your heart <S%H3824><s%> when the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> has driven <S%H1920><s%> them out before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> you, 'Because of my righteousness <S%H6666><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has brought <S%H935><s%> me in to possess <S%H3423><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> land, <S%H776><s%> 'but [it is] because of the wickedness <S%H7564><s%> of these <S%H428><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> [that] the Lord <S%H3068><s%> is dispossessing <S%H3423><s%> them before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> you.

"It is not for your righteousness <S%H6666><s%> or for the uprightness <S%H3476><s%> of your heart <S%H3824><s%> that you are going <S%H935><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> their land, <S%H776><s%> but [it is] because <S%H3588><s%> of the wickedness <S%H7564><s%> of these <S%H428><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> [that] the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> is driving <S%H3423><s%> them out before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> you, in order <S%H4616><s%> to confirm <S%H6965><s%> the oath <S%H1697><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> swore <S%H7650><s%> to your fathers, to Abraham, <S%H1><s%> Isaac <S%H85><s%> and Jacob. <S%H3327><s%>

"Know, <S%H3045><s%> then, [it is] not because of your righteousness <S%H6666><s%> [that] the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> is giving <S%H5414><s%> you this <S%H2088><s%> good <S%H2896><s%> land <S%H776><s%> to possess, <S%H3423><s%> for you are a stubborn <S%H7186><s%> <S%H6203><s%> people. <S%H5971><s%>

"Remember, <S%H2142><s%> do not forget <S%H7911><s%> how <S%H854><s%> <S%H834><s%> you provoked <S%H7107><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> to wrath <S%H7107><s%> in the wilderness; <S%H4057><s%> from the day <S%H3117><s%> that you left <S%H3318><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> you arrived <S%H935><s%> at this <S%H2088><s%> place, <S%H4725><s%> you have been <S%H1961><s%> rebellious <S%H4784><s%> against <S%H5973><s%> the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

"Even at Horeb <S%H2722><s%> you provoked <S%H7107><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> to wrath, <S%H7107><s%> and the Lord <S%H3068><s%> was so angry <S%H599><s%> with you that He would have destroyed <S%H8045><s%> you.

"When I went <S%H5927><s%> up to the mountain <S%H2022><s%> to receive <S%H3947><s%> the tablets <S%H3871><s%> of stone, <S%H68><s%> the tablets <S%H3871><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had made <S%H3772><s%> with you, then I remained <S%H3427><s%> on the mountain <S%H2022><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> and nights; <S%H3915><s%> I neither <S%H3808><s%> ate <S%H398><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> drank <S%H8354><s%> water. <S%H4325><s%>

"And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> me the two <S%H8147><s%> tablets <S%H3871><s%> of stone <S%H68><s%> written <S%H3789><s%> by the finger <S%H676><s%> of God; <S%H430><s%> and on them [were] all <S%H3605><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had spoken <S%H1696><s%> with you at the mountain <S%H2022><s%> from the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the fire <S%H784><s%> on the day <S%H3117><s%> of the assembly. <S%H6951><s%>

"And it came <S%H1961><s%> about at the end <S%H7093><s%> of forty <S%H705><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> and nights <S%H3915><s%> that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> me the two <S%H8147><s%> tablets <S%H3871><s%> of stone, <S%H68><s%> the tablets <S%H3871><s%> of the covenant. <S%H1285><s%>

"Then the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to me, 'Arise, <S%H6965><s%> go <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> from here <S%H2088><s%> quickly, <S%H4118><s%> for your people <S%H5971><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> you brought <S%H3318><s%> out of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> have acted <S%H7843><s%> corruptly. <S%H7843><s%> They have quickly <S%H4118><s%> turned <S%H5493><s%> aside <S%H5493><s%> from the way <S%H1870><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I commanded <S%H6680><s%> them; they have made <S%H6213><s%> a molten <S%H4541><s%> image <S%H4541><s%> for themselves.'

"The Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> further to me, saying, <S%H559><s%> 'I have seen <S%H7200><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> people, <S%H5971><s%> and indeed, <S%H2009><s%> it is a stubborn <S%H7186><s%> <S%H6203><s%> people. <S%H5971><s%>

'Let <S%H7503><s%> Me alone, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7503><s%> that I may destroy <S%H8045><s%> them and blot <S%H4229><s%> out their name <S%H8034><s%> from under <S%H8478><s%> heaven; <S%H8064><s%> and I will make <S%H6213><s%> of you a nation <S%H1471><s%> mightier <S%H6099><s%> and greater <S%H7227><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> they.'

"So I turned <S%H6437><s%> and came <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> from the mountain <S%H2022><s%> while the mountain <S%H2022><s%> was burning <S%H1197><s%> with fire, <S%H784><s%> and the two <S%H8147><s%> tablets <S%H3871><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> were in my two <S%H8147><s%> hands. <S%H3027><s%>

"And I saw <S%H7200><s%> that you had indeed <S%H2009><s%> sinned <S%H2398><s%> against the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%> You had made <S%H6213><s%> for yourselves a molten <S%H4541><s%> calf; <S%H5695><s%> you had turned <S%H5493><s%> aside <S%H5493><s%> quickly <S%H4118><s%> from the way <S%H1870><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had commanded <S%H6680><s%> you.

"And I took <S%H8610><s%> hold <S%H8610><s%> of the two <S%H8147><s%> tablets <S%H3871><s%> and threw <S%H7993><s%> them from my hands, <S%H3027><s%> and smashed <S%H7665><s%> them before your eyes. <S%H5869><s%>

"And I fell <S%H5307><s%> down <S%H5307><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> as at the first, <S%H7223><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> and nights; <S%H3915><s%> I neither <S%H3808><s%> ate <S%H398><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> drank <S%H8354><s%> water, <S%H4325><s%> because <S%H5921><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> your sin <S%H9128><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you had committed <S%H2398><s%> in doing <S%H6213><s%> what <S%H7451><s%> was evil <S%H7451><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> to provoke <S%H3707><s%> Him to anger. <S%H3707><s%>

"For I was afraid <S%H3025><s%> of the anger <S%H639><s%> and hot <S%H2534><s%> displeasure <S%H2534><s%> with which <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> was wrathful <S%H7107><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> you in order to destroy <S%H8045><s%> you, but the Lord <S%H3068><s%> listened <S%H8085><s%> to me that time <S%H6471><s%> also. <S%H1571><s%>

"And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> was angry <S%H599><s%> enough <S%H3966><s%> with Aaron <S%H175><s%> to destroy <S%H8045><s%> him; so I also <S%H1571><s%> prayed <S%H6419><s%> for Aaron <S%H175><s%> at the same <S%H1931><s%> time. <S%H6256><s%>

"And I took <S%H3947><s%> your sinful <S%H9128><s%> [thing], the calf <S%H5695><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you had made, <S%H6213><s%> and burned <S%H8313><s%> it with fire <S%H784><s%> and crushed <S%H3807><s%> it, grinding <S%H2912><s%> it very <S%H3190><s%> small <S%H3190><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> <S%H834><s%> it was as fine <S%H1854><s%> as dust; <S%H6083><s%> and I threw <S%H7993><s%> its dust <S%H6083><s%> into the brook <S%H5158><s%> that came <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> from the mountain. <S%H2022><s%>
"Again at Taberah <S%H8404><s%> and at Massah <S%H4532><s%> and at Kibroth-hattaavah you provoked <S%H7107><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> to wrath. <S%H7107><s%>

"And when the Lord <S%H3068><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> you from Kadesh-barnea, saying, <S%H559><s%> 'Go <S%H5927><s%> up and possess <S%H3423><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I have given <S%H5414><s%> you, 'then you rebelled <S%H4784><s%> against <S%H854><s%> the command <S%H6310><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God; <S%H430><s%> you neither <S%H3808><s%> believed <S%H539><s%> Him nor <S%H3808><s%> listened <S%H8085><s%> to His voice. <S%H6963><s%>
"You have been <S%H1961><s%> rebellious <S%H4784><s%> against <S%H5973><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> from the day <S%H3117><s%> I knew <S%H3045><s%> you.

"So I fell <S%H5307><s%> down <S%H5307><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> the forty <S%H705><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> and nights, <S%H3915><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I did <S%H5307><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had said <S%H559><s%> He would destroy <S%H8045><s%> you.

"And I prayed <S%H6419><s%> to the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> 'O Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> do not destroy <S%H7843><s%> Thy people, <S%H5971><s%> even Thine inheritance, <S%H5159><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> Thou hast redeemed <S%H6299><s%> through Thy greatness, <S%H1433><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> Thou hast brought <S%H3318><s%> out of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> with a mighty <S%H2389><s%> hand. <S%H3027><s%>

'Remember <S%H2142><s%> Thy servants, <S%H5650><s%> Abraham, <S%H85><s%> Isaac, <S%H3327><s%> and Jacob; <S%H3290><s%> do not look <S%H6437><s%> at the stubbornness <S%H7190><s%> of this <S%H2088><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> or at their wickedness <S%H7562><s%> or their sin. <S%H9128><s%>

'Otherwise <S%H6435><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> from which <S%H834><s%> Thou didst bring <S%H3318><s%> us may say, <S%H559><s%> "Because <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1097><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> was not able <S%H3201><s%> to bring <S%H935><s%> them into the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> He had promised <S%H1696><s%> them and because <S%H4480><s%> He hated <S%H8135><s%> them He has brought <S%H3318><s%> them out to slay <S%H4191><s%> them in the wilderness. <S%H4057><s%>"

'Yet they are Thy people, <S%H5971><s%> even Thine inheritance, <S%H5159><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> Thou hast brought <S%H3318><s%> out by Thy great <S%H1419><s%> power <S%H3581><s%> and Thine outstretched <S%H5186><s%> arm. <S%H2220><s%>'
